text: Amarildo de Souza (born 19 January 1999) is a Brazilian footballer who most recently played for New York Red Bulls II on loan from Red Bull Brasil. ==Career== Amarildo began his career in the youth ranks of São Paulo. During March 2017 he signed with Red Bull Brasil joining the under 20 side. On 15 August 2018 Amarildo made his first team debut with Red Bull Brasil, appearing in a 1-0 victory over Noroeste in the Copa Paulista.
